thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com
thread.title: Cat Mom

author: Cat Mom
title: Cat Mom
text: I got a notification saying that the item I was waiting for became available, so I went to their website and bought it. I got an email confirming my purchase, but that was it. I didn't hear a word from them after that for over a week, so I had to contact them. Turned out that the item coming available was a mistake and they didn't know why it happened. Not only did they get my hopes up, they also charged me for the item that never got shipped! Not a great experience.
